story:
Our Story

Wisdompreneurs Publishing is a publishing company with a difference. We specialize in helping transformational authors share their message and contribute to global evolution through the power of the written word.

We are best selling author and publishing genius Sasha Allenby, Wisdompreneurs co-founder and social marketing whiz Paul Zelizer and Wisdompreneurs co-founder and conscious business consultant Alison Raby.  

While many publishing houses are shrinking and not able to support emerging authors due to the current realities of the publishing world, we have the experience and skill to nurture authors at all stages of the process.

As wisdom is at the heart of our company, we take authors who have messages that will have a highly positive impact on the growth of the planet and support them in sharing that message with a much wider audience than most know how to reach in the current economy.  We bring a wide base of skills to this work that we are so passionate about, including:

  • publishing knowledge

  • marketing skills

  • high level business and wisdom world contacts

  • book production know how

  • Kindle expertise

  • website development knowledge

  • editing mastery

  • and much more.

With Wisdompreneurs Publishing, we can help authors at all stages of the writing and publishing process, from the seed of their idea, all the way through to building their platform and launching their book, and supporting their voice to be heard by the wider world on all levels.  

What's at the Heart of Our Campaign?

Our campaign has a dual focus. Firstly, we are launching a book, and a live program based upon it, that will help transformational authors enjoy a much higher degree of success.  

At the heart of our campaign is a book – the first to be published by us – which represents the core message of our company: Write a Game Changing Self-Help Book: The Definitive Guide for Spiritual Entrepreneurs by Wisdompreneurs Publishing CEO Sasha Allenby. It is an essential book for emerging and developing authors in this field, from those who want to start out right the way through to those who have been previously published, but still wish to enjoy a higher level of reach and impact.

Whether you are just starting out or already very well-established, this book and the programs based on it will help you define your unique voice and message in the industry. It supports growing authors to write the most effective and powerful self-help, personal development or spiritual book that is within their capacity to write; starting from scratch and taking them all the way through the process to the finished and marketable product in as little as 12 weeks.


The second focus of our campaign is to fully launch Wisdompreneurs Publishing. Investing in this campaign not only means that you support a forward thinking company to get off the ground.  It means that when you and/or your colleagues are thinking of publishing, there will be a company here that will understand and respect your needs.  We will be here to help you negotiate the complex world of publishing and bringing your voice in front of the world.

How You Can Get Involved

From a $10 ebook version of the book to a customized booking coaching package including a fully designed marketing plan by 2 of the leaders in this sector, there are many ways to contribute to this campaign.  And each of them have been expertly crafted by people who currently make their living in the wisdom and personal development world - and have been doing so for many years.  

At whatever level you contribute to this evolving company, we can assure you that it will not only improve your quality as a writer, and support you to get your book written and out into the world, but it also means that you are taking part in shaping a company that will bring forth the voices for the kind of future you want to live in!  

Why This Campaign?

Wisdom and personal development authors are often faced with the difficult choice of staying true to their message but having a book that has sub-optimal impact or going with a more business savvy publisher and being pressured to compromise their voice in order to maximize profits.  With a deep commitment to BOTH wisdom and world class entrepreneurial skills, Wisdompreneurs Publishing offers the transformational community a path of both staying true to their message and new levels of success and impact.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what you're hearing, share us with your friends! Our big-picture-goal is telling the industry "this is transformational publishing done skillfully." While Wisdompreneurs Publishing will teach us many things, we hope it also serves as a learning model for the wisdom and personal development industries - letting folks know there ARE effective ways to get emerging leaders voices heard.  Your voice matters!

Questions? We’re happy to answer your questions about this campaign or any of the perks.  You can email Sasha at: info@wisdompreneurspublishing.com

story:
What is Sweeping Zen?

Established in 2009 as a grassroots initiative, Sweeping Zen is a digital archive of information on Zen Buddhism. Featuring in-depth interviews, an extensive database of biographies, news, articles, podcasts, teacher blogs, events, directories and more, this site is dedicated to offering the public a range of views in the sphere of Zen Buddhist thought. We are also endeavoring to continue creating lineage charts for all Western Zen lines, doing our own small part in advancing historical documentation on this fabulous import of an ancient tradition. 

Website: sweepingzen.com

Why are funds needed and where does it go?

 
Thank you for taking the time to read this. I’ll try my best to keep it brief.

During the last few years, maintaining Sweeping Zen has gone from a fun hobby to a rewarding full-time job. I believe we are a different kind of Buddhist media outlet — helping to shine a light on issues of importance to Zen communities. We are a publishing outlet committed to telling the truth. What is that worth to you — a place where free and open discussions are encouraged and fostered? What drives me in this work I’m doing is a deep and ongoing distrust for what often passes itself off as journalism these days. I believe only in reporting on what is.

Because Sweeping Zen is a grassroots publisher, the bulk of my income comes from individual contributors like you.

Funds will helps pay me a monthly income, finance our yearly server costs, and pay for our audio hosting. With your support I can earn a living wage and meet my goals of obtaining new transportation and finding my own housing.

$3500 is simply my goal but I know I may not always reach that. Please give whatever you can if you are moved to do so or help get the word out. Thank you!

Here are what some Zen teachers say about the website

Here are some links to a few video endorsements for Sweeping Zen from teachers like James Ishmael Ford Roshi of Boundless Way Zen and Genjo Marinello Osho of Chobo-ji in Seattle.

James Ishmael Ford Roshi video

Genjo Joe Marinello Osho video

Impact

Your contribution today will make continuing my work at the website possible and allow for 1000's of readers like yourselves to derive benefit from the articles and news items we run. Thank you for that!

Other ways to help

If you're not able to contribute, please get the word out. Share this on Facebook or tell your friends. Anything you can do to help will be greatly appreciated.

story:
The Basics

My name is Mitzi and I am a personal trainer and yoga teacher based in Montreal, Quebec. 

8 years ago I lost my mom to colon cancer. This past September, my dad was diagnosed with ALS, a terminal motor neuron disease. So I guess you could say I know a thing or two about stress...

I've been burnt out. I suffered from depression and anxiety. I cried myself to sleep every night.

And then I got out.

Out of the funk. Out of the darkness. Out of the haze.

It was a mixture of many different things, all of which began with baby steps. And in this e-book I will provide you with the 8 elements of self-care that I either used or have seen others use with success.

I’ve researched these topics extensively, trained in several and interviewed local experts on the subjects in order to provide the most in-depth look at each element.

What’s the issue here? We all experience stress but no one teaches you how to deal with it. No one teaches you how to care for yourself, period. And that is why this book is SO important.

The book will also include a home-workout plan, grocery list for healthy eating, yoga sequence and printable colouring pages.  

My targeted publishing date is November 30th or earlier. Let's make this happen! 

What I Need & What You Get

I'm hoping to raise $4,500 which will cover a multitude of costs that include the following:

  • Upgrading my website and online store in order to sell a digital product
  • Paying professionals for editing and proofreading services, photography, marketing, etc. 
  • Other related expenses like copywriting, software, and more

I've put together some perks to reward you for your generosity. You can find them on the right side of this page.

I've created limited edition Mitzfitness #ThriveThroughSelfCare t-shirts JUST for this campaign! If you want to be the proud owner of one, now is your chance. 

I'm also offering consultations on self-care, fitness or nutrition as well as the opportunity to host a fitness or yoga class with me in Montreal for you and 5 friends! 

If I don't reach my goal, the funds raised will still go towards their intended use however my publishing date will be pushed to 2018. 

If I surpass my goal, I will be printing copies of this book for organizations that deal with chronically or terminally ill patients as well as their caregivers since it is a stressful situation that I am all too familiar with.

Why Self-Care?

Human beings, love to give give give and go go go. We hustle and bustle throughout our days sometimes without even stopping to eat (which is bad, don’t do that).

We are emptying our tanks of energy and barely replenishing it.

Taking just a few minutes each day to do something for ourselves has such a tremendous effect on the hormones and chemicals in our body which, in turn, affects our stress levels, mood and energy.

What is self care? Care of ourselves by ourselves. Grand or simple, self care is a way to ensure the we are filling our own "cups" of energy before filling others'. 

Without it, we risk burn out, depression and the inability to honour our commitments, and responsibilities, or worse. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that sometimes you just can't spare the cash. And that's ok! You can still help. 

  • Share this campaign with your friends and family on social media
  • Sign up for my newsletter over on my website to stay up to date on all things Mitzfitness

Thank you, to each and every one of you, whether you support this campaign financially or not, for taking the time to read my story. 

xoxo

Mitzi 

 

*~*~*~*~*~*

Major shout out to Jorge Zavagno/Lunera Productions for my campaign video and to Nikki Diaz at Au Premier for the makeup.

story:
¿Qué?

Ladrones de tiempo combina lo mejor del thriller con oscura fantasía, dando como resultado un cocktail explosivo.

Después de conseguir dar un golpe de tiempo, tanto Dylan como su hermano Bill deberán desaparecer. Sin embargo, la Policía los sigue muy de cerca y las artimañas de Dylan no podrán siempre hacerles salir airosos. Por suerte, cuentan con casi nueve minutos que podrán usar para retroceder al pasado y arañar unos segundos a sus perseguidores.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una joven editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para valorar la aceptación y viabilidad de cada título.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy te presentamos a Óscar Gallego.

Nacido en Venta de Baños, una pequeña localidad palentina, el 12 de marzo de 1995. Allí creció y, posteriormente, comenzó sus estudios universitarios en Salamanca, ciudad en la que cursó el grado en Ingeniería Geológica. Desde pequeño estuvo muy interesado en la música y en la literatura. En 2013 sacó, junto a su grupo, Sofoko, su primer disco: Bajo Cero. Casi al mismo tiempo, empezó a interesarse por la escritura y comenzó a escribir Proyecto Supervivientes, novela publicada por la editorial Atlantis en junio de 2017. Un mes más tarde, en julio de 2017, quedó finalista del IV Premio de Novela Juvenil CEPA por la presente obra, Ladrones de tiempo.

¿Por qué?

Por aquí, un par de fragmentos del texto para ir abriendo el apetito:

«A las once llegamos al aeropuerto. No llevábamos nada de equipaje, tan solo el maletín con el dinero y nuestros contadores bien anclados a la muñeca. Me acerqué hasta el punto de venta de la aerolínea y, tras esperar una larga cola, compré dos billetes a Buenos Aires.
     Quedaban casi tres horas para el vuelo por lo que fuimos al McDonald´s del aeropuerto a cenar. A mí no me entusiasmaba demasiado la comida rápida, pero sabía que a Bill le encantaba. De repente, él levantó la cabeza de su hamburguesa y empezó a respirar muy deprisa, con ansiedad. 
     ―Bill, ¿estás bien?
     ―Tenemos que irnos ―musitó y por el tono de su voz noté que algo no iba bien.
     ―¿Qué pasa?
     ―Acaban de detenernos.
     ―¡¿Qué?! ―pregunté en voz demasiado alta y él me mostró su contador. En él ya no aparecían cuatro minutos y medio sino tres y medio. Entonces lo entendí. Nos habían detenido y Bill había accionado su contador.
     ―¿Cuánto tiempo tenemos?
     ―Menos de un minuto, tenemos que irnos»

 «Vi cómo miraba de un lado a otro esperando mi aparición sorpresa, sin previo aviso, oculto entre las sombras para que no me capturaran tal y como hice en el funeral de Andrés. Mi corazón comenzó a correr desbocado y los nervios se apoderaron de mí. No quería que me viese, así no. Sin embargo, unos segundos después nuestros ojos se cruzaron y pude ver como ahogaba un grito. Estaba dándole las razones que necesitaba para convencerla de que su marcha no había sido un error, que había hecho lo correcto al abandonarme para evitarse todo aquello. A pesar de la distancia que nos separaba pude ver como una lágrima se escapaba por su ojo izquierdo. Su cara adoptó en un primer momento un gesto de nostalgia, seguido de desesperación, rabia y, finalmente, desprecio. El último pedazo de corazón que todavía sobrevivía a los ataques suicidas de las emociones estalló en mil pedazos. Cuando terminó el acto intenté acercarme a ella, sin embargo los guardias me retuvieron. Estaban siempre atentos por si intentaba escapar, pero lo que ellos no sabían era que ya no quería hacerlo. El infierno en el que estaba encerrado calentaba por igual dentro que fuera de la cárcel»

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 800€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de Ladrones de tiempo que saldría después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Óscar Gallego vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

story:
Story of My Book

Beyond Listening is a look at how to understand your teenager from new perspectives. It uncovers ways to bridge the gap between parent and teen communication to build stronger healthier relationships. 

My name is Lisa Jass, and I am the author of Beyond Listening. I wrote this book because, as a high school teacher, many of my students share their struggles of communicating with their parents with me. I felt inspired to do something to bridge this gap. Through my own experiences and those of teens, a lot of research, and my tools as a transformational coach for parents and teens, this book was born.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how the teenage brain works, the true differences in your teen’s life from yours, the importance of perspective, what it means to really listen, the importance of young people having adult mentors, and other tools for communication. In this book, I hope to instill in you as parents the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for really listening to my students (your kids) in you. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you build a healthy relationship with your adolescent child built on effective communication.

In this book, you'll learn about listening with more than your ears and the differences between then and now. You'll hear stories such as...
  • When I was a teen, I almost got busted for curfew even though I was already in bed. 
  • Young Clint Pulver used to get in trouble at school until one teacher realized his potential.
  • How the misunderstanding of a word from a teen had a school nurse thinking a mother may be abusing her child. 
You will love this book if you are a parent of a teen, if you deal with teenagers in any way, if you have trouble communicating.

Beyond Listening is a nonfiction book that speaks to parents of teenagers and teachers or coaches who want to look at communication and listening in a new way.

 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Summer.


When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.


I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review them and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more!
 

About the Author


Lisa Jass has been teaching high school English for over 20 years and is a Transformational Coach for parents and teens. She has always put the needs of her students above her own. 

She wrote this book to help teens like her students who are struggling every day communicating with their parents. Often when emotions are involved, it's hard to get perspective. She hopes this book will act as a bridge to bring parents and teens together. Teaching and helping her students has always been her passion. Jass is always searching for new ways to help both parents and her students reach common ground and develop rich positive relationships.

Lisa is an avid reader. She loves to travel to visit friends and family and see the world. Her favorite places to visit are the ones she’s read about in the literature she teaches. She loves Disney movies and likes to choose a favorite character from each movie. She has a huge collection of Sven stuffed animals from Frozen. She loves to laugh and is often a bit sarcastic. 

For more information, you can connect with Lisa Jass at lisa@candidconversationscoaching.com and at IG @lisajassccc FB @lrjass LI: @LisaJass
 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier. 

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #beyondlistening and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so that we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my pre-sale campaign via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

 

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Lisa Jass

story:
Short Summary

 

Beyond the Surface:  Empathy, Identity, and Storytelling is a humanizing look at what makes us who we are and how we can use stories to respect and honor each other's perspectives and identities. 

My name is Teresa Xu, and I am the author of The Beginning to the End. I wrote this book because empathy has always been important to me, and I wanted to share my perspective on being respectful in a particularly troubling time for the world.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover parts of yourself and others you never really thought about before, that you will pay closer attention to the people around you. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to learn with me about the importance of understanding and respecting different walks of life.

In this book, you'll encounter multifaceted dimensions of empathy, identity, and diversity, and how storytelling can build meaningful connections and bridge divisions, through narratives like:

  • My first story exchange with Narrative 4 and how it opened my eyes to a new way of learning about people and feeling their experiences
  • Brandon Stanton realizing after meeting Barack Obama that you can't necessarily judge someone by one moment
  • The power of writing in respecting identities and telling stories through Girls Write Now

You will love this book if you are passionate about amplifying underrepresented voices and really, if you simply care about others.

The Beginning to the End speaks to educators, artists, advocates and activists who want to grapple with equity and storytelling in a new way.

Ultimately, I hope that The Beginning to the End inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

How do I view myself and form perceptions about others?

How might I share my voice through a form of art? What should I keep in mind if I want to tell someone else's story?

How might we slowly address structural problems by first understanding how we can make changes in our individual, everyday lives?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing how our identities function in our daily lives, how they relate to inclusion efforts, and how they can be represented through storytelling will change us all for the better.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy and eBook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this summer.

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and eBook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

*For international preorders, please send me a private message.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheBeginningtotheEnd and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.

You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Teresa Xu

 

About the Author

Teresa Xu is a student at Vanderbilt University pursuing a Bachelor of Arts in Sociology, English literature, and an interdisciplinary health major called Medicine, Health and Society. She was born and raised in Vancouver, Canada, where she graduated from high school with an International Baccalaureate Diploma.

She wrote this book because she is passionate about people, empathy, compassion, and stories. Stories have been the undercurrent of her own life, shaping her into who she is and who she is still becoming. She hopes to simply help other people as much as she can, and she is especially interested in addressing environmental and health policy issues through education. She continues her efforts to promote empathy by leading the student organization Narrative 4 Vanderbilt and welcoming first-year students through a 3-month orientation program.

When she isn’t worrying about her uncertain future or her current responsibilities, she enjoys listening to music, singing in the shower, going on walks and bike rides, writing poetry and personal essays, and hanging out with old and new friends (even on Zoom). She wishes she knew how to cook, drive, and take care of plants (or even her pet turtle Swimmer). She would recommend meditation, prayer (emphasize the gratitude!), and sleep as a coping mechanism and hopes that everyone can learn to show vulnerability and advocate for their own needs. She is on an eternal learning journey.

For more information, you can connect with Teresa at xuteresa6@gmail.com, on LinkedIn or Facebook, or @teresaxu6 on Instagram.

I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help
Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #TheBeginningtotheEnd and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.
Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!Thanks again,Teresa Xu
 
About the Author
Teresa Xu is a student at Vanderbilt University pursuing a Bachelor of Arts in Sociology, English literature, and an interdisciplinary health major called Medicine, Health and Society. She was born and raised in Vancouver, Canada, where she graduated from high school with an International Baccalaureate Diploma.She wrote this book because she is passionate about people, empathy, compassion, and stories. Stories have been the undercurrent of her own life, shaping her into who she is and who she is still becoming. She hopes to simply help other people as much as she can, and she is especially interested in addressing environmental and health policy issues through education. She continues her efforts to promote empathy by leading the student organization Narrative 4 Vanderbilt and welcoming first-year students through a 3-month orientation program.When she isn’t worrying about her uncertain future or her current responsibilities, she enjoys listening to music, singing in the shower, going on walks and bike rides, writing poetry and personal essays, and hanging out with old and new friends (even on Zoom). She wishes she knew how to cook, drive, and take care of plants (or even her pet turtle Swimmer). She would recommend meditation, prayer (emphasize the gratitude!), and sleep as a coping mechanism and hopes that everyone can learn to show vulnerability and advocate for their own needs. She is on an eternal learning journey.For more information, you can connect with Teresa at xuteresa6@gmail.com, on LinkedIn or Facebook, or @teresaxu6 on Instagram.

story:
What is the Fantasy Football Magazine?

The Fantasy Football Magazine is transforming the way Fantasy Premier League managers play the game.

Focusing on strategy, tactics and advice, the first edition was read by thousands of FPL managers looking for something different in an industry that can often feel like an echo-chamber of obvious captaincy tips and dull differential picks.

With in-depth contributions from the best fantasy football pundits, thinkers and analysts in the industry, the Fantasy Football Magazine is essential reading for any manager looking to genuinely improve their FPL performance.

With this campaign, we want to create monthly editions across the 17/18 season, send print copies to readers across the world and develop our digital offerings to make access to the free e-magazine easier than ever before.

"They've managed to create something stylish, comprehensive and genuinely useful." - fantasyfootballpundits.com



What's Inside?

The Fantasy Football Magazine looks at the fundamentals of FPL strategy whilst keeping a finger firmly on the pulse of those changing FPL trends and fluctuations.

Releasing the magazine monthly gives us the ability to acknowledge the current FPL trends without succumbing to the temptation to react to short-term, explosive changes. The perfect balance.

Alongside the contemporary advice, we’ll focus on timeless theory and tactics too. Last edition examined topics like the psychology behind transfer decisions, game theory, in-depth statistical analysis and even featured an interview with a former world champion.

"The Fantasy Football Magazine is a refreshing and welcome addition to the FPL scene. A bible of FPL words." - fantasyfootball247.co.uk



Magazines Delivered Straight to Your Door

It’s high time that FPL had a print magazine. We counted 5 fishing magazines in WHSmith last week, and yet, with millions of managers worldwide, there isn’t a single fantasy football publication to flick through...Until now.

We’ll be sending out beautiful printed copies of our monthly magazine throughout the 17/18 season, starting with a special pre-season guide to get your best FPL campaign yet off on the right foot. It’s time to start looking out for the postman again.

“Whether you're a novice or an expert, the Fantasy Football Mag is for you. A truly groundbreaking publication” - fplbet.com
 


Anytime, Anywhere, Any Device

Having listened to our reader's feedback, we understand that an accessible e-magazine doesn't just mean free-of-charge, it means usability, compatibility and functionality. 

We want to raise funds to vastly improve the design, layout and format of our website and e-magazines. This includes the introduction of responsive turn-page technology and distributing the magazine across all major e-book apps too.

"FFMag has filled a big hole in the market. I now have all the info in one place, instead of trying to keep up with the 100 FPL accounts on Twitter!"
- Mark Donaldson, ESPN
 


Why We Need You

You might still be wondering why we're asking for your help.

Well, the answer is pretty straight forward. The Fantasy Football Magazine cannot continue without it. The main costs of producing a fully-fledged, monthly magazine are as follows:

Image Licensing

A magazine is nothing without fantastic images. We've been approved by the Premier League's licensing body to use official images, now we've just got to pay for them. The necessary image license will cost us £4,000 (£400 per issue) for the season.

Product Development  

We want all of our digital and print offerings to look and feel perfect. This means investment in the development of the magazine, focusing on improved design and usability. If you thought the 1st Edition looked the part, you've seen nothing yet.

Writer/Designer Fees

We will always be a publication that pays its writers and designers. We want the best, and it's important to us that we pay for it.

As you can see, the initial funds needed to get this off the ground are too overwhelming for us to tackle alone. We parted with a lot of our personal money to create the first edition, and that was without image licensing or print copies.

Quite simply, if the Fantasy Football Magazine is going to be around next season, it needs your support.
 


What's In It For You?

Well, firstly, a free Fantasy Premier League e-magazine. Our digital magazines will always be free, and this will never change.

Every perk is discounted exclusively for Indiegogo. We also have an enticing array of referral rewards that will never be available again. To put it bluntly, there's never been a better time to get behind the Fantasy Football Magazine.

We've put time and research into our rewards, always with an eye on the feasibility of delivery. We surveyed our readers extensively and we looked at what other magazines are doing too. The result, we hope, is a competitively priced range of fantastic perks that our readers have asked for, and that we know we can deliver.
 


Why Crowdfunding?

Going through crowdfunding kills two birds with one John Stones. Firstly, it gives us the opportunity to raise the necessary funds. 

Secondly, it enables readers to become actively engaged with the success and progress of the Fantasy Football Magazine. By supporting us today, you become a direct beneficiary of the Fantasy Football Magazine, and a massive contributing factor to its development.

Our perks are priced on the basis that we will be able to offer a beautiful, monthly print magazine, sleek, usable e-magazines and a much improved reader experience as of next season.

Our fixed financial target reflects those aims. We cannot deliver the product our backers expect without that money, so, in the event that we do not reach our goal, we’ll have to come up with a plan B. Perhaps we’ll hire Marco Silva in the hopes he can dig us out of trouble.

It also means you can be confident that you’ll only be charged for a high quality product that has been created with the funds we’ve asked for.
 


Referral Contest

Our referral contest is perfect for those who have backed the campaign and want to spread the word further.

Share our campaign with your mini-league's Whatsapp group, send it to your colleagues in an email or plaster it on your Facebook feed. If just 2 of your friends purchase the subscription perk, you'll already be on the first rung of our bonus ladder.

Referring others is easy, but you'll need to have already backed the campaign to get started. Simply log into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to get posting. They'll use their analytics to track your progress, and we'll be in touch if you pass one of the milestones. You can also check your referrals yourself through your Indiegogo profile.

For more info, read Indiegogo's guide on how to participate in referral contests.
 


What Are You Waiting For?

If you're still unsure, why not read Edition 1 and take a look at the magazine for yourself? It's free, and compatible with all devices.

You might also be interested to see what our readers have to say about the magazine. Here are just some of the overwhelmingly positive comments we received after launching the first edition:

“As a serious FPL player I found it entered a level of analysis and research you rarely find elsewhere.”

“Well done. A very informative and researched read.”

“Superb. Brilliant work, truly in depth and I might get the sack if I spend another hour reading it at work.”

“Very insightful and great to get into the minds of the top managers and writers.”

“I’m honestly amazed at the quality of this mag. It’s a lovely thing.”

“Truly one of the most coherent, well laid-out magazines I’ve ever seen…”

Take advantage of our early bird perks and support the future of quality, innovative FPL content. The Fantasy Football Magazine is an industry-changing publication and we want you to be a part of it. We promise it'll be worth your while.

story:
My stage name is LatinoA2J, which stands for ‘Addicted 2 Jesus.”  I was born, Nelson Marrero,  in Brooklyn New York.  I enlisted in the US Marine Corp where I learned structure, discipline and pride; traits that were not fostered by the men in my life.  I remember my mother telling me to become something greater than the men in my life…the only problem was I had no role models to guide me.  That all changed when I met a man that led me to the only role model I would ever need in my life…the person of Jesus Christ.  In one single moment I accomplished the wishes of my mother and I became a ‘greater man’ because of He that came to reside in my heart.   I have now been a Christian for over 25 years and for almost 20 of those years I have been active in many areas of youth, young adults and men’s ministry.  I received my Certificate of Christian Ministry from Boyce Bible College and will soon graduate from Bethel College and accredited with the Assembly of God church.  I am currently co-hosting a Blog Talk Radio Show (The Artist Outlet Consortium) that features poets from all over the United States.

My vision is to enter the entertainment field and to help young Christian men and women realize that the Christian life can be lived with power as long as our focus is always Christ Jesus.  God has given me the opportunity to introduce others to the One that can bring those trapped in darkness into the light of God’s loving mercy and grace.  You too can be a part of this ministry by supporting my efforts
 

 Your support will help me continue making CD’s, music videos and attend AMTC (a training center for Christian entertainers).  With this training I will be equipped to impact this generation through the medium that has such an impact on society.  By supporting me you too will be directly involved in  Jesus’ last commission…to make disciples of all nations. 

What We Need & What You Get

I have released 3 CD’s and 1 Spoken Word Video, and I will continue to make more videos that can be seen on You Tube and other video internet sources.  AMTC (http://www.amtcworld.com/) will be working with me to make me a more polished performer.  In addition, they will open doors for God’s message to reach some of the biggest names in Hollywood through a 3 day audition. For more information about AMTC please visit their website.

AMTConline.com

• Over 200 articles on talent and modeling

• VIP advice and industry tips

• Seven study modules

• Spiritual preparedness

• Learn to be "ten times better"

• Style development: “The Cool Factor”

• Industry Do's and Don'ts

• Placement and casting advice

• Access to the AMTC Help Desk

†To remain current with industry trends, curriculum subject to change

 

Regional Coaching

• Over 20 hours of professional coaching with your group

• Coaches specializing in acting, modeling, singing, and dance

• IGNITE Orientation: jump start your training

• LAUNCH Weekend: talent training intensive

• SHINE Dress Rehearsal: final preparation

• Fellowship with uplifting coaches and positive performers

• Advice and assistance after the SHINE event

* Notification of castings, ongoing advice, spiritual support in major markets

 

If my goal of $6,000 is not reached I will use the monies collected to produce more spoken Word videos to help get the Gospel message out to men and women.  I will also continue to produce CD’s and perform at churches and poet venues throughout the East Coast. 

 

 

The Impact

To see more of my God given gift please go to my web site www.latinoa2j.com

Other Ways You Can Help

I appreciate the time that you have taken to read about this ministry opportunity.  If you cannot contribute at this time you can still be a great help by sending this message and URL to others who share your passion for saving lost souls for the glory of our Lord, Jesus Christ.  As part of one body we can all be a part of changing lives. A great man once said …”One hand washes the other hand and both hands wash the face” …Stay Strong…Stay Focus…Stay Blessed…

story:
What ?

My name is Stella Kanu and I am looking for support to develop the next stages of my novel.

 

The Latchkey Girls is the first of a trilogy that evokes the music and politics of Black Britain in the 1970's – it’s about love, the 1979 disco dancing championships, the intensity of first friendships, the subtle effects of childhood trauma and finding your way in the 21st century with all its snake oil and grease monkeys!

A bit about Me

I have created strategies and implemented programmes that at a community level bring people and arts together.  I have poured my passion and commitment into my work with inner city young people, low income families, ex-offenders under 19; women who experienced mental health and/or prison systems, Asian communities in east London, Homeless and new immigrant arrivals/ refugees, emerging creative entrepreneurs in south London housing estates and indigenous white communities in London’s Barking and Dagenham. To name but a few.

The motivation behind the novel

Over my career I have raised hundreds of thousands of pounds to support meaningful engagement projects and brokered deals with many different types of businesses and individuals to support meaningful projects.

I have loved my time helping others "do" their art but my own creativity became none existent.

Despite being awarded the Powerbrokers International Leadership Award (Arts Council England/ Cultural Leadership Programme) in 2008, and after almost two decades supporting, producing, programming and marketing professional writers, dancers, theatre and film makers, I am up for some personal change; re-channeling my energies and finally making use of that old degree in Writing by using National Novel Writing Month (NanoWriMo) to begin the first draft of a novel I have harboured over the last 3 years. 

First Draft Complete!

I am making great progress, helped by the fact I am not fighting for work in the UK but living on rice and Thai street food to keep my costs low and my hand continually typing.

I have completed the first draft  during November's Nanowrimo ( National Novel Writing Month) whilst in SE Asia. During 2014 I hope to be on the road for 9 - 12 months living low and aiming high with the first and final drafts.

What I Need 

There are many ways for you to participate: sponsor a paragraph, sponsor a page, sponsor a chapter, and, if you’re really excited, sponsor the book!

My target goal is $8,000

I need help with:
Accommodation   
Electric, Phone, Internet,
Travel
Supplies

Laptop repairs or add-ons

Novel writing software subscription costs

What You Get

$10/ £6 - A big warm Thank You on Facebook and Twitter & e-sample opening pages

$25/ £15 - A personal email and update & e-sample opening pages

$50/ £30 - A Thank You credit in book & e-sample chapter

$250/ £150 - Suggest a character prompt that will be used in the final book & e-sample chapter

$750/ £ 450 - Get a character named after you! Get an e-sample of the book  (up to 10 pages)

$1000/ £600 - Dinner with author and private reading and e-copy of book

$2500/ £1500 - All of the above plus a City tour!

The Impact

I am a passionate and thoughtful writer - my work has appeared in Arvon Foundation's Exciting Writing Anthology (2000) and I have performed my words in many venues - I can write. I can write well. There are many books about the Black British experience - I want to expand the diversity of understanding of Second Generation Black Britain's (especially African) who often get over shadowed by other narratives. I am also keen to create a dialogue around trauma and the effects of childhood PTSD on adult lives. 

NanoWrimo has reminded me how easy writing is for me.

I want to finish what I have started. I have a return flight booked and I hope I don't make it!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, I understand that, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Suggest other ways of sharing this page
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

I think I need at least 100,000 people to see this page and if those who give are in single percentage digits - we are rocking! Thank you so much!

story:
Story of My Book

Abigail is a book that centers around a teenage girl that is saved from her sadistic mother by a young man and in return, she has to help him save other girls. Atlanta is a hard place to survive. Abigail knows that all too well, but there are tougher obstacles than just the world around her. Can she find the strength to trust again?

My name is Gloria Kitchens and I am the author of Abigail. I wrote this book because I wanted to explore a futuristic setting in a place I know very well, Atlanta. I’ve always been interested in what the future would look like and I think a story of trust and identity helps solidify the setting 150 years in the future.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that it gets easier to trust people again. I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for friendship and trust in you. And ultimately, I want this book to be a tool to help you see how starting to trust people again can help you continue moving forward in finding yourself as Abigail does.

In this book, you'll learn about friendship and trust:

Abigail learns to trust the man who saves her.

Abby finds herself in order to help save other people like her.

You will love this book if you like the fast-paced nature of heists as well as how much the world will change in hundreds of years. Abigail is a fiction book that speaks to young adults and sci-fi lovers who are looking at the darkness and light of people for the first time.

The Book - Abigail

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part 1 contains the Introduction + additional chapters. Introduces Abby living in the pollution-filled outskirts of Atlanta where she spends her days living in a locked cell in her Mother's basement until a man changes her reality forever

Part 2 contains Chapters 4-9. Where Abby finally explores life inside the city dome of Atlanta while also figuring out how she could be useful in saving other girls like her

Part 3 contains Chapters 10-14. Where Abby and the man who saved her must figure out a way to save as many people as possible against all odds
 

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2019

  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter
When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:
  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

Gloria Kitchens is a student of Tufts University studying Applied Mathematics and Computer Science. She wrote this book because she feels that the voice of a young adult minority would be valuable in the science fiction genre. In her spare time, she’s usually breaking computer programs with her subpar coding skills or breaking many other important things while playing rugby.

For more information you can connect with Gloria at gloria.kitchens@tufts.edu and on LinkedIn.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network.

  • Please tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.

  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page

  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Gloria Kitchens

story:
The above image is one of the happiest times of my life. It is during the WEPA! Fest 2013 in Los Sures, Brooklyn. I am on stage and my lovely wife is behind me, along with my beautiful son, who is about to run up to me and give me a big hug. The sun is shining down on me and it is a moment like this, where I feel connected to the universe and my purpose, where I am the most alive.

What up mi gente? Many of you know me, but for those who don't, my name is Anthony Morales and I'm a writer/educator from the Bronx NY who has been teaching and performing for the past 12 years. During these crazy years, balancing school and poetry has been difficult. I have literally gone from my last period class, to the plane, to the gig, performed, ate, got right back on the plane and been ready for a 9 am class Lord knows how many times. Needless to say, many great chances have come and gone.

One of them being VONA. Back in the mid 2000s, I applied and got into Ruth Forman's workshop. I was ecstatic, elated, overjoyed. However, when I attempted to get clearance to attend, I was thwarted and yet another opportunity to pursue my happiness was squandered. I never thought VONA would be a possibility again. Until now.

I applied for VONA 2014 at UC Berkeley, CA for many reasons, It is one of the most prestigious writing workshops for people of color in the nation. It is a vital network for everyone involved. I want to surround myself with amazing wonderful inspiring people. One of my mentors/influences, Willie Perdomo, is teaching a poetry workshop. The sun moon and stars lined up and told me to go and I got in! I am excited to be able to become a student again. This workshop will be the chance of a lifetime to study and be inspired by incredible authors.

In a world where art, especially poetry, seems disposable, a statement of faith is necessary. I have supreme faith that this moment in time is imperative to my literary career. I want to become a better writer and learning from esteemed colleagues is a positive step in the right direction.

This is where you, my incredible friends and familia, can help. Any contribution will help this trip be monumental in my growth as a writer and essential to my development as a human being. The workshop costs $950 and airfare costs $700.  $350 should cover incidentals. The numbers are important, but the cost is really priceless considering the return on your investment.  I even got some perks to help out! Each of these rewards are especially for you to commemorate the moment and document your part in assisting me reach one of my dreams.


I've broken bread, drink or something else (lol) with many of you over the years. I humbly and respectfully ask mi gente to donate whatever you can or will to make an abstract idea into concrete reality for me.  This will be the beginning of the rest of my artistic career. I hope along this path, I will publish, I will perform, I will share, I will cry, I will evolve. I don't know where this journey will eventually take me, but I'm sure I want to have each of you there with me on it. Vamos y Pa'lante! I love you all infinitely.

story:
Story of My Book 

The Apprentice Mindset is a book about how mastery, purpose, and success can be found by apprenticing experts.

My name is Katarvia Taylor, and I am the author of The Apprentice Mindset. I wrote this book because after years of observing, working with, and studying people who achieved stratospheric success, I wanted to share what I discovered was that catalyst and most important key to their achievement – without fail, 100% of them either had an apprenticeship relationship and/or an apprentice mindset. I then decided to take a deeper dive and explore their stories, the notion of apprenticeships, and how since the beginning of time apprenticeships have been the key to unlocking potential and helping humanity find purpose and success.  

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will become inspired and motivated by the stories of well-known and not so-well-known individuals who deliberately sought out and/or submitted themselves to the masters of their fields. And because iron sharpens iron, these apprentices discovered, honed, and developed their potential to a point where they achieved mastery and went on to make significant contributions in their industries, society, and the world. In this book, I hope to share with you the same sort of passion and excitement that I found in learning more about the master/apprentice pairs presented. Ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you realize that purpose, mastery, and success are not solely discovered through an internal introspective process but also by taking on the mindset of an apprentice and placing oneself in the orbit of a master. A well-developed internal compass is not always the primary key to finding your way in life. Taking a journey with experienced masters will guide you toward finding your own path toward destiny and success.

In this book, you'll learn about how apprenticeships lead to the acquisition of tacit knowledge and mastery through observation, imitation, and eventually finding one’s voice and way.    You'll hear stories such as...

How Jamie Dimon’s decision to turn down offers from Goldman Sachs, Morgan Stanley, and Lehman Brothers to apprentice Sandy Weill when he was President at American Express gave Dimon the opportunity to learn how to successfully manage billion-dollar mergers and acquisitions fresh out of Harvard Business School.

How Congressman Charlie Rangel and the first-ever US Trade Representative for Africa Rosa Whitaker were two of the key architects of the African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA), the cornerstone of the United States’ trade policy with Africa. Whitaker worked with Congressman Rangel and learned how relationship building, negotiation, and consensus building are key to getting tough things done.

Cellists Pablo Casals and Bernard Greenhouse and how apprenticeships among top musicians is a lesson in how imitation can lead to improvisation and innovation.

You will also hear stories of how:

An ocean enthusiast apprenticed his father to become one of the top dive instructors and foremost experts on marine conservation.

A church’s protégé program became the ultimate apprenticeship model for creating a pipeline of leaders to drive the expansion of its programs in Washington, DC.

The Apprentice Mindset is a nonfiction book that speaks to students, recent college graduates, young professionals, and those looking to change their careers. It provides a new way to look at the notion of finding purpose and success.

The Book - The Apprentice Mindset

The book is written in 3 parts.

  • Part 1 contains the introduction + chapters 1-3. In the section, I present the case for apprenticeships. I look at the history and benefits of apprenticeships and show how they are different from other key relationships – advisory and mentorships. I argue here that what makes an apprenticeship particularly powerful is that it is formalized and intentional.

 

  • Part 2 contains chapters 4-8. The focus of the main part of the book is on the Apprentice Mindset. Here I share stories of master/apprentice pairs and use research to dissect and explore what made the apprentice a success. I look at concepts such as the acquisition of tacit knowledge through observation; imitation v. emulation; learning unwritten rules; and how masters in the end are gatekeepers and door “unlockers” who consciously and unconsciously guide their apprentices to success.  

 

  • Part 3 contains chapters 9-10. In this application section, I look at how masters and apprentices can make the most of the relationship. I also explore the the inevitable challenges and difficulties that come with any relationship and how they can be navigated.   

What I Need & What You'll Get

  • This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December, 2021.
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this Winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

And much more!

Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,500 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)
Tier 2: Hit $6,500 and the book will get a hardcover edition
Tier 3: Hit $8,500 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

About the Author

Katarvia Taylor, a native of The Bahamas, has spent the past twenty five years studying, working and living throughout Africa, Europe, Latin America, and North America. During this time, she has worked with global experts in a range of disciplines including international finance, transaction advisory services, and renewable energy project development amongst others.

Her inaugural book is the outcome of her desire to understand the why and how of successful individuals. In it she posits that success can be achieved and purpose discovered by developing the apprentice mindset.

Katarvia holds a Master of Science degree in Information Systems Technology with honors (Beta Gamma Sigma) from The George Washington University and she graduated Phi Beta Kappa from Georgetown University with a Bachelor of Arts in French, German, and Latin American Studies.

For more information, you can connect with Katarvia at apprenticemindset@gmail.com  and www.linkedin.com/in/katarviataylor 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:

  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
  • Use this form : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdOhmW... share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't help.

  • Please feel free to share my pre-sale campaign on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook with your friends. Please use #apprenticemindset and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sales Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. You can do so via text or direct message on social media:
    • Instagram - @katarviataylor / @newdegreepress
    • Twitter - @katarvia / @NewDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Katarvia Taylor

story:
Story of My Book

How to Make a Blindfolded Free Throw: The Art and Science of Growing an Audience Online is an interdisciplinary approach to help you understand how people earn a following on the internet. Whether you’re an entrepreneur, old-school marketer or casual web-surfer, I want to demystify what I’ve learned about social media growth in simple terms.

My name is JJ Meador and I am the author of How to Make a Blindfolded Free Throw: The Art and Science of Growing an Audience Online. I wrote this book because I’ve been obsessed with the internet my whole life (classic millennial, I know), and have always dreamed of going viral. I’ve taken a deep-dive into the functions of content-sharing platforms, and am ready to share what I’ve learned.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will understand how to grow your personal brand or business presence online. In this book, I hope to instill the same passion and excitement that I have for the role of social media and web platforms in you. Ultimately I want you to see this book as a tool to help you understand how our online ecosystem functions, and offer tricks to help your long-term growth efforts. And if that’s not your style, I want you to enjoy the stories of individuals, products and brands absolutely breaking the internet!


In this book, you’ll learn that A LOT of influencers secure multi-million dollar earning years from their content creation efforts and how you can start on the same path:

  • How a 7-year-old earned $22 million dollars on YouTube in 1 year
  • How one of my high school teammates' art took off on Instagram, and proved to me that it really is possible to grow an audience
  • Why you should take a long-term approach to your growth efforts, what exactly that means, and how you can take the first step
  • And some stories that I just think are cool

You will love this book if you are a casual social media user, entrepreneur looking to up their game online, or are curious about ways people have intentionally gone viral on the internet. How to Make a Blindfolded Free Throw is a non-fiction book that speaks to social media users and content creators who are looking at growing their audience online, and creating the best content they can for the first time
 

The Book - How to Make a Blindfolded Free Throw

My book is written in 4 parts...

Part 1 Contains the introduction with some personal stories on my successes and failures trying to grow audiences online. A generation ago, kids grew up wanting to become doctors, teachers, astronauts, and professional athletes. The world has changed, and a recent study found that 34% of kids want to become YouTubers when they grow up and another 14% want to become bloggers/vloggers. In terms of the blindfolded free throw: if these kids shoot their first shot without practice or guidance, it’s very unlikely to go in. However, if they improve their form and consistently practice, they are much more likely to ‘score’ and go viral.

Part 2 contains a differentiation between the two most important elements of your content’s ‘form’: the medium and the message. With the help of top media theorists, I first differentiate between the medium and the message with tricks to best utilize each. I dive into how Dollar Shave Club created a viral advertisement and Joey Bada$$ schemed YouTube with their own twist on ‘perfect form.’ And I remind you, that if your content doesn’t perform as well as you hoped, that's data and data is your friend.

Part 3 contains a couple of different methods to consistently have content to upload to each platform. Methodologies span from being helpful to students on a budget, parents or children looking to merge family fun with internet growth, and entrepreneurs looking to take their web-game to the next level. A plug to the man who’s killing it with his content: Gary Vee’s Pillar Content Deck on LinkedIn is necessary to read.

Part 4 is an attempt to turn long-term audience size and content performance into an algorithm. I intend for this part to stand-alone, and be read more as a general ‘social media theory,’ than an actionable set of steps to follow. I was educated with an interdisciplinary approach for my entirety of school, and have always been fascinated by concepts that are transitive between what I'll call cousin disciplines. I believe Economics and Digital Marketing are cousin disciplines, and explain why.

Part 5 is an action check list. I believe strongly in massive action, and if you complete the steps on this check-list RIGHT NOW, you WILL see at least some results. 

 

What I Need & What You'll Get


This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

 

 

The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript on December 2, 2019

The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!

The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)

The Copyediting for My Book - to make help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication

The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this winter.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.



I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

 

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A Personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

About the Author

JJ Meador is a Digital Sales Associate at SmartBrief, and a Social Media consultant: @jjmeador.

JJ wrote this book because of his fascination with the potential for Social Media platforms. His interest was first sparked as a high school student, when he realized their potential role in the future of politics. While his interests in politics have faded, his love for digital platforms has grown.

JJ Meador is a former Division 1 Water Polo player who some say spends too much time on his phone. He loves to follow the NBA, and grow Instagram accounts with friends and family—but his absolute favorite things to do all involve the beach.

For more information you can connect with JJ at on social media at @JJMeador and jmeador2@fordham.edu.
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #ShootingBlind and tag me (@jjmeador) as well as my publisher, New Degree Press so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book to 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much of all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
JJ Meador

story:
Our Story  

DJ Andrews desired a life of significance. To that end, she agreed to trust God and obey His voice - no matter the cost.  Since that time, her life became anything but normal!  The true stories shared in this book will encourage readers to explore deeper levels of faith than ever before.  

 

This "ordinary" woman, who's lived an extraordinary life, has organized events for thousands, many of whom were introduced to faith in God for the very first time, ran companies with no prior experience and even left a vibrant career behind to travel half-way across the world with a family of five, to a place completely unknown to them, simply because it was asked of them.  With this move came no backing organization, no jobs, no friends and no idea as to why they'd been asked to "go"- and yet, in faith and in obedience, they went!

  

Although DJ Andrews' faith was tested many times, through financial hardship, chronic illness, personal opposition and more, her story also chronicles a life lived in the miraculous - dreams, visions and incredible God-ordained encounters.  She experienced first-hand, the power of God at work in, and through, the anointed arts!  

 

"You Want Me To Do WHAT?" has been accepted for publication by WinePress Publishing and is currently ready for editing and printing. This is where YOU come in...  

The Impact

These are difficult times.  Folks need encouragement.  They need to understand that even on the darkest of days, God is with them.  They need to witness and receive testimony of a life of faith to which they can relate.  There are many stories of persecution in the faith from other countries, which are riveting and truly compelling but not many from the vantage point of a "regular" person from the western world.  

 

DJ Andrews has spent 14 years living this story and 3 years writing it and believes, strongly, that this is a story which must be heard. Please participate in encouraging others in their walk, by giving what you can so that this story, and the valuable lessons learned, can be shared.

 

"You Want Me To Do WHAT?" will challenge those new to faith in God and strengthen those who already live by faith.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Immediate Hard Costs: $2500 for editing

Eventual Hard Costs:   $18,310 for typesetting, design and the printing of 5000 books 

Website Cost:  $5000

 

A large percentage of the marketing will emanate from/via ArtsBridge International website. 

The publishing company will market to book stores, Amazon.com and trade shows.  

 

OUR OFFER TO YOU!!

 

While the IndieGoGo campaign goal is $18,000, we believe that we will achieve our goal to raise $25,500 in order that we might create a product of excellence.

 

If however, we do not receive the necessary funds to print 5000 off-set, high quality books, then we'll switch to the print-on-demand option, which has a lower up-front cost, but a higher cost incurred for each and every book printed. This way, even if we don't acheive our goal, we do have another option for putting those donations to good use.

 

 

If we DO receive the necessary funds to print the book, this is what we'll do:

 

*For every donation of $40+, YOU will receive a signed copy of the book

 

*For every donation of $100+, YOU will receive a signed copy of the book plus we will donate two books to missionaries of your choice

 

*For each subsequent gift of $100, the same as above will apply 

 

ie) a $300 gift would mean - 3 copies of a signed book for YOU and six books go to missionaries. If you don't know that many missionaries, we have access to names. AND... if you have access to names that you'd like to give us, we're open to receiving those names and addresses from you and will add them to our list of possible recipients. 

 

We believe the Christian missionaries will be greatly encouraged by this gift which is why we have chosen to bless them in this way.

 

*For every gift of $1000+,you will receive the same as above and you might even get a hug!  Actually, we are open to suggestions for this level of giving.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

YOU can also help with this project by encouraging others to participate.  Get the word out.  Together we can do this!  We also value your prayers.  Thank you!
